message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it'll be worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low just yet. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. It's a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows us both to come to an agreement.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer at $10,500. This price reflects my budget constraints while still acknowledging the value of your product.
